maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.h
/*

#ifndef BEAST_JOB_WRAPPER_H
#define BEAST_JOB_WRAPPER_H

#include <beastapi/beastjob.h>
#include <beastapi/beastrenderpass.h>
#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeenums.h"

namespace beastmaya {

class BeastJob : public BeastObject<ILBJobHandle> {
public:
        BeastJob(ILBJobHandle h) : BeastObject<ILBJobHandle>(h) {
        }

        ~BeastJob() {
                ILBDestroyJob(m_obj);
        }

        BeastTargetPtr createTextureTarget(ILBConstString name, int32 width, int32 height);
        BeastTargetPtr createAtlasedTextureTarget(ILBConstString name, int32 maxWidth, int32 maxHeight, int32 maxTextures, bool rescale, float threshold);
        BeastTargetPtr createVertexTarget(ILBConstString name);
        BeastTargetPtr createCameraTarget(ILBConstString name, BeastCamera& camera, int32 width, int32 height, bool cameraRender);
        BeastTargetPtr createUVUnwrapTarget(ILBConstString name, float texelPerWorldUnit, float segmentationThreshold = 0.3f, float unwrapFlatness = 1.0f, float straightness = 0.5f, float compactness = 0.0f);
        BeastRenderPassPtr createFullShadingPass(ILBConstString name);
        BeastRenderPassPtr createIlluminationPass(ILBConstString name, ILBIlluminationMode mode);
        BeastRenderPassPtr createLuaPass(ILBConstString name, ILBConstString script);
        BeastAmbientOcclusionPassPtr createAmbientOcclusionPass(ILBConstString name, float maxDistance, float coneAngle);
        BeastRNMPassPtr createRNMPass(ILBConstString name, ILBIlluminationMode mode, ILBRNMBasis basis);
        BeastLightPassPtr createLightPass(ILBConstString name, ILBLightPassType type);

        void start(ILBShowResults sr, ILBDistributionType dt);
        void waitDone(int timeout);
        bool isRunning();
        ILBJobStatus getResult();
        bool hasUpdate();
        ILBUpdateType updateType();
        ILBJobUpdateHandle getUpdateHandle();
        void destroyUpdate();
        bool hasProgress(bool& newActivity, bool& newProgress);
        void getProgress(std::wstring& jobName, int& progress);

        void setRenderMaxDepth(int depth);
        void setRenderQuality(float quality);
        void setRenderSamples(int minSamples, int maxSamples, float varianceThreshold);

        void setErnstDisplayGamma(float displayGamma);
        void setErnstDirectIllumination(float scale);
        void setErnstIndirectIllumination(float scale);
        void setErnstDiffuseBoost(float boost);
        void setErnstEmissiveScale(float scale);
        void setErnstVarianceThreshold(float threshold);
        void setCausticsMode(ECausticsModeType mode);

private:
        ILBJobUpdateHandle m_uh;
};

}

#endif // BEAST_JOB_WRAPPER_H
Please send us your comment about this page
